snippet: The well of Spicewood Beach in central Texas is among 13 public water systems throughout the state that are projected to run out of water in 180 days or less.
abstract: Drought-stricken central Texas community of Spicewood Beach has been forced to bring in water by truck from more than 10 miles away because its sole well came close to running out of water; the community's well is one of 13 public water systems in the state that are projected to run out of water in 180 days or less.
lead_paragraph: The well of Spicewood Beach in central Texas is among 13 public water systems throughout the state that are projected to run out of water in 180 days or less.
